main_definition: November is the eleventh month of the year in the Gregorian calendar, typically associated with autumn and early winter.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The name of the eleventh month of the year
meanings_and_examples.example: November marks the transition from autumn to winter.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference in literature or history when discussing events that occurred in November
meanings_and_examples.example: The signing of the Treaty of Paris took place in November 1783, ending the American Revolutionary War.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In some contexts, 'november' can be used as a slang term or informal word to represent the number eleven
meanings_and_examples.example: The team had eleven players on the field during the championship game, which is sometimes colloquially referred to as playing in 'november.'

meanings_and_examples.definition: In certain contexts, particularly related to dates and calendars, 'November' can be used metaphorically or symbolically
meanings_and_examples.example: The project deadline was set for the end of November, signifying a time of final preparations.
